price: 127. En dus vergelden Wij hen die de grenzen overtreden hebben en niet in de tekenen van zijn Heer geloven en de bestraffing van het hiernamaals is veel strenger en langduriger.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika najzī man asrafa walam yu'min biāyāti rabbihi walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaddu wa-abqā
